concept.title: Configuring PSP Communication and Payment Types

section.p: Before an organization can use the services of a commercial PSP, you need to specify the parameter values required for communicating with the PSP and define the payment types offered by the PSP.

p.b: To configure a PSP and define the payment types offered by the PSP:

section.p: In the administration portal, choose Manage payment service provider in the Operation menu. For detailed step-by-step instructions, refer to the online help.
